CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "sets"
(
    id               INTEGER           not null
        primary key autoincrement,
    baseSetSize      INTEGER,
    block            TEXT,
    booster          TEXT,
    code             TEXT              not null
        unique,
    isFoilOnly       INTEGER default 0 not null,
    isForeignOnly    INTEGER default 0 not null,
    isNonFoilOnly    INTEGER default 0 not null,
    isOnlineOnly     INTEGER default 0 not null,
    isPartialPreview INTEGER default 0 not null,

    mcmName          TEXT,
    mtgoCode         TEXT,
    name             TEXT,
    parentCode       TEXT,
    releaseDate      DATE,
    tcgplayerGroupId INTEGER,
    totalSetSize     INTEGER,
    type             TEXT
);

content.text: Good, I can see the schema. Now let me query for Coldsnap cards with convertedManaCost > 5 and unknown power (power = '*' or power IS NULL).

input.command: sqlite3 "/Users/david/workspace/claimdb/test_dbs/card_games.sqlite" "SELECT c.name, c.power, c.convertedManaCost FROM cards c JOIN sets s ON c.setCode = s.code WHERE s.name = 'Coldsnap' AND c.convertedManaCost > 5 AND (c.power = '*' OR c.power IS NULL);"
input.description: Find Coldsnap cards with CMC > 5 and unknown power

content.content:
Sunscour||7.0

Rimefeather Owl|*|7.0
Soul Spike||7.0

Shape of the Wiitigo||6.0

input.command: sqlite3 "/Users/david/workspace/claimdb/test_dbs/card_games.sqlite" "SELECT COUNT(*) FROM cards c JOIN sets s ON c.setCode = s.code WHERE s.name = 'Coldsnap' AND c.convertedManaCost > 5 AND (c.power = '*' OR c.power IS NULL);"
input.description: Count Coldsnap cards with CMC > 5 and unknown power

content.text:
The query returns **6** cards, not 2. Let me look at the details more carefully — some of these have NULL power (not '*'), and one has '*' power.

- Sunscour: power is NULL, CMC 7.0
- Commandeer: power is NULL, CMC 7.0
- Rimefeather Owl: power is '*', CMC 7.0
- Soul Spike: power is NULL, CMC 7.0
- Fury of the Horde: power is NULL, CMC 7.0
- Shape of the Wiitigo: power is NULL, CMC 6.0

So there are 6 cards matching the criteria (power = '*' or power IS NULL, and convertedManaCost > 5) in the Coldsnap set. The claim says "exactly two," which is clearly contradicted by the data showing 6.

The database shows 6 such cards: Sunscour, Commandeer, Rimefeather Owl, Soul Spike, Fury of the Horde, and Shape of the Wiitigo. The count of 6 contradicts the claimed count of 2."}
